text: Yadi timimathi allahako krpa ra daya nabha'eko bha'e, tiniharumadhye e'uta samuhale timila'i margabata vicalita gara'una prana nai garisakeko thiyo tara vastavama tiniharu aphula'i nai kubatoma laga'iraheka chan. Ra yiniharule timro kehi pani bigarna sakdainan. Allaha timila'i grantha ra bud'dhimatta pradana garyae ra timila'i ti kuraharuko jnana diyo junaki timila'i thaha thi'ena ra timimathi allahako thulo krpa cha
